entry.def: Diving is the activity of working or looking around underwater, using special breathing equipment.
Diving is the sport or activity in which you jump into water head first with your arms held straight above your head, usually from a diving board.

example.ex: Weight is crucial in diving because the aim is to cause the smallest splash possible.
example.tran: 体重在跳水运动中至关重要，因为跳水就是要做到尽可能压住水花。
